sentences: Ayumi Hamasaki (浜崎あゆみ, Hamasaki Ayumi, born October 2, 1978) is a Japanese singer, songwriter, record producer, actress, model, spokesperson, and entrepreneur.
Born and raised in Fukuoka, Fukuoka Prefecture, Hamasaki moved to Tokyo at 14 in 1993 to pursue a career in singing and acting.
In 1998, under the tutelage of Avex CEO Max Matsuura, Hamasaki released her debut single "Poker Face" and debut major-label album A Song for XX.
Since 2006, after her album (Miss)understood was released, album and single sales have declined.
From 1999 to 2010, Hamasaki had at least two singles each year topping the charts.
Following an ear infection in 2000, she has suffered worsening hearing loss and gradually became completely deaf in one ear.
